Detailed Description

Behavior family for feline predators, which will avoid attacking groups of prey and have a slight ambush quality to them.

Author:
Jack Owen Shelton CS4322 Project Predator VS. Prey Simulator.
Date:
Spring 2009 As the predator becomes hungrier the more aggressive it becomes and the less likely it is to ambush.
